title: FRIENDS LIST GONE?
body:
Do i post it here or elsewhere?... 
so, i just logged in... and my whole friend list is gone... what has happened? {{item:3070}}

replies.body: if you have transferred from a different server, your friend list will not be transferred as well with you if you did that.
no im still in the same server (euw), somehow it just all dissapeared..

> [{quoted}](name=KN03Xo,realm=EUW,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=HVHw6jha,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-06-05T22:54:04.867+0000)
>
> no im still in the same server (euw), somehow it just all dissapeared..

Hey KN03XO,

I just wanted to check back in with you to see if you were still having issues. Let me know if you need any help!
we always knew you had no friends ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Riot realised you have no friends :^)
